name: Cabbage Revenge
description:
Bun Bun should dodge the falling cabbage and in the same time fight with the current. You should be persistent, so you can save Bun Bun from the Cabbage.

How to play:
Tap repeatedly to fight the stream!
Dodge the rolling cabbage! 
Help Bun Bun get to safety.

If you complete even level one you can try get more stars by replaying the level. Yeah good luck! 
Compete with friends and improve in rankings. Once you see someone is better than you, you will spend longer time in the toilet, so you can be on top. 

Beware the cabbage revenge! The most difficult game right now!
